00034 using namespace std;
00035 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00036 
00037 #define TEST_DATA_ALL_COLUMN_TYPES "../data/test.file.data_all_column_types"
00038 
00039 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00040 #pragma warning(disable: 4996) // ignore deprecated functions warning

00043 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes );
00044 
00045 DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes()
00046 {
00047         data = 0;
00048         dataPlane = 0;
00049 }
00050 
00051 DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::~DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes()
00052 {
00053 
00054 }
00055 
00056 void DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::setUp()
00057 {
00058         // Open one DataSet.
00059         data = new GenericData;
00060         GenericFileReader reader;
00061         std::string name = TEST_DATA_ALL_COLUMN_TYPES;
00062         reader.SetFilename(name);
00063         reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00064         try
00065         {
00066                 dataPlane = data->DataSet(0,0); // there is only one DataSet
00067         }
00068         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException&)
00069         {
00070                 dataPlane = 0;
00071         }
00072 }
00073 
00074 void DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::tearDown()
00075 {
00076         if (dataPlane)
00077                 dataPlane->Delete();
00078         delete data;
00079 }
00080 
00081 void DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::testCreation()
00082 {
00083         // Check that the DataSet was created.
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00085 }
00086 
00087 void DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::testOpenDataSet()
00088 {
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 void DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::testAccessColumnValues()
00095 {
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00097 
00098         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00099         //int32_t cols = dataPlane->Cols();
00100 
00101         // types to receive values.
00102         int8_t b;
00103         u_int8_t ub;
00104         int16_t s;
00105         u_int16_t us;
00106         int32_t i;
00107         u_int32_t ui;
00108         std::string str;
00109         std::wstring wstr;
00110         float f;
00111 
00112         for (int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row)
00113         {
00114                 // expected values
00115                 char expected_str[10];
00116                 wchar_t expected_wstr[15];
00117                 int8_t expected_b = 1+10*row;
00118                 u_int8_t expected_ub = 2+10*row;
00119                 sprintf(expected_str, "%d", 3+10*row);
00120                 int16_t expected_s = 4+10*row;
00121                 u_int16_t expected_us = 5+10*row;
00122                 int32_t expected_i = 6+10*row;
00123                 u_int32_t expected_ui = 7+10*row;
00124                 FormatString1(expected_wstr, 15, L"%d", 8+10*row);
00125                 float expected_f = (float)(9+10*row);
00126 
00127                 // Get and check the values
00128                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, b));
00129                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(b == expected_b);
00130                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 1, ub));
00131                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ub == expected_ub);
00132                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 2, str));
00133                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(str == expected_str);
00134                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 3, s));
00135                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s == expected_s);
00136                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 4, us));
00137                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(us == expected_us);
00138                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 5, i));
00139                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(i == expected_i);
00140                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 6, ui));
00141                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ui == expected_ui);
00142                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 7, wstr));
00143                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(wstr == expected_wstr);
00144                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 8, f));
00145                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(f == expected_f);
00146         }
00147 
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00149 
00150 }
